  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103120</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion de la lumière dans deux miroirs</string>
            <string language="en">Light reflection in two mirrors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Reflexion in zwei Spiegeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão clara em dois espelhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione chiara in due specchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά αντανάκλαση σε δύο καθρέφτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión ligera en dos espejos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Première sur six illustrations montrant deux miroirs formant un angle l'un par rapport à l'autre et un rayon d'incidence de lumière  frappant un miroir. Ceci peut être utilisé comme exercice où il faudrait tracer la trajectoire du rayon.</string>
            <string language="en">First of six illustrations showing two mirrors at an angle with each other and an incident ray of light striking one mirror. This can be used as a ray tracing exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Angles</string>
            <string language="en">Angles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">miroirs</string>
            <string language="en">mirrors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">traçage de rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray tracing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion</string>
            <string language="en">reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von sechs Abbildungen, die schräg zwei 
Spiegel mit einander und einem Ereignisstrahl des Lichtes einen 
Spiegel anschlagend zeigen. Dieses kann als verfolgenübung des 
Strahls verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de seis ilustrações que mostram 
dois espelhos em um ângulo com se e em um raio do incident da luz que
golpeia um espelho. Isto pode ser usado como um exercício 
seguindo do raio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di sei illustrazioni che mostrano 
due specchi ad angolo con a vicenda e un raggio di avvenimento di luce
che colpisce uno specchio. Ciò può essere usata come 
esercitazione seguente del raggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα έξι απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν δύο καθρέφτες 
διαγωνίως η μια με την άλλη και μια συναφή ακτίνα του φωτός που 
χτυπά έναν καθρέφτη. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί ως 
άσκηση επισήμανσης ακτίνων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de seis ilustraciones que muestran dos 
espejos en ángulo con uno a y un rayo del incidente de la luz pulso 
un espejo. Esto se puede utilizar como ejercicio que rastrea del
rayo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlverfolgung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ângulos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espelhos</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
